CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: full metal jacket
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The soft lead core is encased in a harder metal coating, combining a medium amount of stopping power and armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Features a hardened steel penetrator core for increased armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: hollow point
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A hollowed out tip causes the bullet to expand on impact, increasing tissue damage at the cost of armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing discarding sabot
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with an incendiary compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and potentially igniting targets.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: armor-piercing high-explosive
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with high-explosives that detonate on impact for additional damage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: tranquilizer
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Special round designed for non-lethal engagements of targets. Filled with fast-acting sedatives and tipped with a hypodermic needle.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: rubber bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Special round designed for non-lethal engagements of targets, intended to inflict painful but non-fatal injuries.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: taser
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Special round designed for non-lethal engagements of targets, delivering an incapacitating electrical current.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: flare
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Special round based around a brightly-burning incendiary element, used for signaling and illumination.
